attributes.action: Force Tory MP Danny Kruger to resign.
attributes.additional_details:
We should all share disgust at Tory MP Danny Krugers comments that women "should not have bodily autonomy in cases of abortions" which were made in parliament a few days a go. 

Not only is it not his place as male who has never struggled for anything in his life to give comment on something he will never experience, it is completely unacceptable for a member of Parliament to consider legally taking away bodily autonomy of half the population as something that is up for "democratic debate"
attributes.background: Tory MP Danny Kruger believes that women should not have bodily autonomy 100% of the time, therefore Mr Kruger is a member of Parliament that believes half the population should have there bodily autonomy removed. Someone who has these believes should NOT be a member of Parliament, it is dangerous.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
